item.title: Presentations
item.description: This is a list of my previous presentations: Note: links to presentation materials are provided for illustration purposes only and may only represent preliminary findings that have since changed. International Society of Environmental Epidemiology (ISEE) 2019 Conference. Utrecht, the Netherlands. Poster Greenness as a protective factor for childhood-onset inflammatory bowel disease?

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Michael and this is my blog page that I will update on my spare time to highlight various projects and methods that I have learnt! Donâ€™t mind the mess, I am currently still setting things up! Download a pdf of my CV here

item.title: Ottawa Winters
item.description: The setting It was a cold and snowy beginning to Spring here in Ottawa. We had just had one of the most intense and drawn out winters, or at least that is what it felt like to me. To confirm my suspicians, I wanted to take a look back at previous years to see how this past winter ranked. Luckily for me, there is an excellent publically available data source for historical Canadian weather data, provided by Environment Canada.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Description This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
